title: New: Four Tet – ‘Suit & Tie’ & ‘For These Times’
content:
Justin Timberlake’s long awated 3rd LP, The 20/20 Experience, is just around the corner, dropping March 18 in the UK.

Four Tet has got his hands on the stems, creating this chopped and screwed bouncy little house number. He’s also shared a new track, “For These Times“, that appears on the Nonplus compilation Think and Change.

Listen to both below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
